trans-unit.source: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir skrivbar tilgang til bestemte attributter slik at brukere kan endre skrivebeskyttede egenskaper for "midlertidige" standardobjektet som er sendt til en <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> objekt ved [spørringen ved eksempel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).

trans-unit.source: The AdvancedFilters class is accessed from a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property, and is effectually treated like a property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object, and isn't intended to be used on its own.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AdvancedFilters åpnes fra en <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>objekt via den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A>egenskapen og behandles effectually som en egenskap for den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>objekt, og er ikke ment å brukes på en egen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skal kalles direkte.

trans-unit.source: Applications should access <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property of the user object.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan få tilgang til <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters>via den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A>-egenskapen til brukerobjektet.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate*> attribute to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: Angir spørringsfilter for den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate*>attributt til den angitte typen tid og sammenligningen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: Som standard tiden UTC.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi tiden i lokal tid, angi <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.DateTime>objektet som <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>objektet.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `expirationTime` should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> som angir hvordan `expirationTime` skal brukes i sammenligningen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime*> query filter to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime*>spørringsfilter til den angitte typen tid og sammenligningen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime*>

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: Som standard tiden UTC.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi tiden i lokal tid, angi <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.DateTime>objektet som <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>objektet.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `lockoutTime` should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> som angir hvordan `lockoutTime` skal brukes i sammenligningen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a query filter for a property in an extended class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et spørringsfilter for en egenskap i en utvidet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute
trans-unit.target: Navnet på attributtet

trans-unit.source: An object.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The object type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen for `value`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `value` should be compared to the attribute's value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> som angir hvordan `value` skal sammenlignes i attributtverdi.

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount*> attribute to the specified value and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: Angir spørringsfilter for den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount*>attributt til den angitte typen for attributtet value og sammenligningen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount*>

trans-unit.source: An integer.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `badLogonCount` should be compared to the attribute's value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> som angir hvordan `badLogonCount` skal sammenlignes i attributtverdi.

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt*> attribute to the specified <xref:System.DateTime> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: Angir spørringsfilter for den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt*>attributt til den angitte <xref:System.DateTime>og den angitte sammenligningsverdien.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt*>

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: Som standard tiden UTC.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi tiden i lokal tid, angi <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.DateTime>objektet som <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>objektet.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `lastAttempt` should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> som angir hvordan `lastAttempt` skal brukes i sammenligningen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.

trans-unit.target: Angir spørringsfilter for den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastPasswordSet*>attributt til den angitte <xref:System.DateTime>og den angitte sammenligningsverdien.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastPasswordSet*>

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
